main event: The observer saw an extremely bright white light in the western sky that traveled in a northerly direction at a high rate of speed until it disappeared.
interesting points: The light traveled in an irregular manner, first hovering, then darting and making sharp turns.
The light exhibited a peculiar motion that the observer said was definitely not a satellite or airplane.
The light projected a powerful brilliance that illuminated a large area of the sky.
No sound was heard during the observation, despite the brightness of the light.
The light passed through the trees and disappeared behind a cloud, never re-emerging from the cloud.
